content.query:
SELECT o.TotalPrice, p.BrandName, p.Name, c.LastName
FROM Orders As o
JOIN Products As p ON p.Id = o.ProductId
JOIN Customers As c ON c.Id = o.CustomerId

SELECT SUM(o.TotalPrice), p.Name
FROM Orders As o
JOIN Products As p ON p.Id = o.ProductId
JOIN Customers As c ON c.Id = o.CustomerId
GROUP BY p.Name
